response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $13,500. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget, so we can proceed to finalize the transaction. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 13500}
